metaTitle: Financing partners at your side – MyHome24App
metaDescription: Regional banks, brokers and advisors present their mortgage products directly on MyHome24App. Transparent, digital and personal.
imgAlt: Handshake between banking partner and MyHome24App

hero.title: Trusted partners for your property financing
hero.subtitle: Together with banks and brokers we support your clients on their way into their new home.

title: Financing partners at your side
description: Our partner banks and financing experts offer attractive conditions, fast decisions and personal advice – tailored to the German real estate market.
featuresTitle: What you can expect as a partner

features.title: Visibility among active home seekers
features.text: Show your financing offers exactly where users are searching for their next home.

features.title: Qualified leads
features.text: Interested users can contact you directly via MyHome24App – including basic information about the property.

features.title: Digital processes
features.text: Simplified first contact, clear structures and the option to integrate your own tools.

features.title: Long-term cooperation
features.text: Transparent collaboration, regular feedback and continuous development of the platform based on your needs.

banks.title: For banks
banks.text: Present your regional or national mortgage products directly next to relevant listings and reach users who are already planning concretely.

brokers.title: For brokers
brokers.text: Position yourself as an independent expert for complex financing cases and use MyHome24App as a digital first contact channel.

clients.title: For clients
clients.text: Users can find the right contact person faster and save time when searching for financing offers.

tipText: We are planning a dedicated partner section where trustworthy providers can present their financing products in a transparent way.
tipSubtext: Use the contact form to send us some first information about your institution or company. We will get back to you with further details.
legalItems: MyHome24App does not currently provide its own loans but offers non-binding orientation only.
For binding information on conditions and approval, please contact your bank or financing broker directly.
The results of the mortgage calculator do not replace individual legal, tax or financial advice.
Cooperations are only entered into with regulated and trustworthy financial service providers.
